Descriptive analysis of transition risk scores for all tilt_subsectors per scenario-year-tilt_subsector benchmark

Source: vignettes/articles/descriptive-analysis-transition_risk_score_per_scenario_year_tilt_subsector.Rmd
descriptive-analysis-transition_risk_score_per_scenario_year_tilt_subsector.Rmd

This article shows how to calculate the descriptive analysis of transition risk scores for all tilt_subsectors per scenario-year-tilt_subsector benchmark using product-level output of Transition risk profile indicator.

Example subset of product-level output of Transition risk profile. 

transition_risk_product_example <- example_transition_risk_product_trs_des_analysis()
kable(transition_risk_product_example |> head(20))
tilt_subsector grouping_transition_risk transition_risk_score
chemicals 1.5C RPS_2030_tilt_subsector 1
chemicals 1.5C RPS_2030_tilt_subsector 2
chemicals 1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector 3
chemicals 1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector 4
chemicals NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector 5
chemicals NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector 6
chemicals NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector 7
chemicals NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector 8
iron & steel 1.5C RPS_2030_tilt_subsector 9
iron & steel 1.5C RPS_2030_tilt_subsector 10
iron & steel 1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector 11
iron & steel 1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector 12
iron & steel NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector 13
iron & steel NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector 14
iron & steel NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector 15
iron & steel NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector NA

Descriptive analysis for benchmark “1.5C RPS_2030_tilt_subsector”

Descriptive analysis for benchmark 1.5C RPS_2030_tilt_subsector
tilt_subsector grouping_transition_risk tr_average tr_median tr_25th tr_75th
chemicals 1.5C RPS_2030_tilt_subsector 1.5 1.5 1.25 1.75
iron & steel 1.5C RPS_2030_tilt_subsector 9.5 9.5 9.25 9.75

Descriptive analysis for benchmark “1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector”

Descriptive analysis for benchmark 1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector
tilt_subsector grouping_transition_risk tr_average tr_median tr_25th tr_75th
chemicals 1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector 3.5 3.5 3.25 3.75
iron & steel 1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector 11.5 11.5 11.25 11.75

Descriptive analysis for benchmark “NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector”

Descriptive analysis for benchmark NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector
tilt_subsector grouping_transition_risk tr_average tr_median tr_25th tr_75th
chemicals NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector 5.5 5.5 5.25 5.75
iron & steel NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector 13.5 13.5 13.25 13.75

Descriptive analysis for benchmark “NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector”

Descriptive analysis for benchmark NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector
tilt_subsector grouping_transition_risk tr_average tr_median tr_25th tr_75th
chemicals NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector 7.5 7.5 7.25 7.75
iron & steel NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector 15.0 15.0 15.00 15.00
